Menkumham: Eksekusi Perampingan Birokrasi Masih Tunggu Peraturan
04 Nov 2019, 22:07 by Alfreds Tuter


Menkumham: Eksekusi Perampingan Birokrasi Masih Tunggu Peraturan

KBRN, Jakarta : Menteri Hukum dan HAM (Menkumham), Yasonna Laoly mulai angkat bicara soal rencana pemangkasan jabatan Eselon III dan IV di jajaran pemerintahan. 
Yasonna mengaku hingga saat ini pihaknya masih menunggu peraturan dari Kementerian Pendayagunaan Aparatur Negera dan Reformasi Birokrasi (KemenpanRB) perihal eksekusinya. 
"Kan kita akan tunggu aja dulu, kan ga bisa kita buat begitu harus ada peraturan Menpan RB," ungkapnya di Jakarta, Senin (4/11/2019).
Ketika ditanya awak media terkait ada tidak penolakan jajarannya pada rencana pemangkasan itu, Yasonna hanya menjawab kementeriannya memiliki aparatur di daerah yang musti dipikirkan penempatannya ketika rencana ini direalisasikan.
"Kami kan bukan apa, kami tuh punya aparatur di daerah, kanwil-kanwil itu bagaimana?," ucapnya.
Meski begitu dia menyebutkan rencana ini telah dibahas bersama Presiden RI, Joko Widodo dalam ratas. KemenpanR menurutnya akan memepelajari kebijakan perampingan birokrasi ini.
"Jadi kita sudah bicarakan itu, dalam ratas (Rapat Terbatas) bahkan sudah dibicarakan kemarin, itu akan dipelajari MenpanRB," tutupnya.
Sebelumnya, rencana perampingan birokrasi melalui pemangkasan eselon di kementerian telah disampaikan Presiden Joko Widodo usai dirinya dikukuhkan sebagai Presiden periode 2019-2024.Jokowi menuturkan penyederhanaan birokrasi harus terus dilakukan besar-besaran. Investasi untuk penciptaan lapangan kerja harus diprioritaskan. Prosedur yang panjang harus dipotong, birokrasi yang panjang harus dipangkas."Eselonisasi harus disederhanakan. Eselon I, eselon II, eselon III, eselon IV, apa tidak kebanyakan? Saya minta untuk disederhanakan menjadi dua level saja, diganti dengan jabatan fungsional yang menghargai keahlian, menghargai kompetensi," kata Jokowi.

Menkumham: Bureaucracy Downsizing Execution Still Awaiting Regulation
Nov 04 2019, 22:07 by Alfreds Tuter


Menkumham: Bureaucracy Downsizing Execution Still Awaiting Regulation

KBRN, Jakarta: Minister of Law and Human Rights (Menkumham), Yasonna Laoly began to talk about plans to cut Echelon III and IV positions in the ranks of government.
Yasonna admitted that until now it was still waiting for regulations from the Ministry of Administrative Reform and Bureaucratic Reform (KemenpanRB) regarding the execution.
"We will just wait for it, can't we make it so there must be a RB Menpan regulation," he said in Jakarta, Monday (11/04/2019).
When asked by the related media, there was no rejection by the ranks of the plan, Yasonna only answered that the ministry had apparatus in the regions whose placement should be considered when the plan was realized.
"We are not what we are, we have apparatus in the regions, how about the regional offices?" He said.
Even so, he mentioned that the plan had been discussed with Indonesian President Joko Widodo in a constraint. According to him, KemenpanR will study this bureaucratic downsizing policy.
"So we have already discussed it, in the ratas (Limited Meeting) even discussed yesterday, it will be studied by the MenpanRB," he concluded.
Previously, the plan to streamline the bureaucracy through echelon trimming at the ministry had been delivered by President Joko Widodo after he was confirmed as President in the 2019-2024 period. Jokowi said that simplification of bureaucracy must continue to be carried out on a large scale. Investment in job creation must be prioritized. Long procedures must be cut, long bureaucracies must be cut. "Echelonization must be simplified. Echelon I, echelon II, echelon III, echelon IV, is it not too much? I ask to be simplified to just two levels, replaced by functional positions that value expertise, appreciate competence, "Jokowi said.
